about_the_game: Roll, Jump, Avoid! The Amazing Ball is a game where you are a ball, and you must complete the mazes and avoid all the obstacles at all costs. Just don't get caught by the Spiky Ball!
detailed_description: Roll, Jump, Avoid! The Amazing Ball is a game where you are a ball, and you must complete the mazes and avoid all the obstacles at all costs. Just don't get caught by the Spiky Ball!

short_description: In this demo, you will get a peek at some of the content that will be in The Amazing Ball. This Demo includes 20 Mazes, 3 Challenges, and 5 Balls.
